20.eng-name: The Book of Qiyam Al-Lail (The Night Prayer) and Voluntary Prayers During the Day

hadiths.text: It was narrated from Ibn Abdur-Rahman bin Abza from his father that:The Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) used to recite in witr: "Glorify the Name of Your Lord, the Most High;' and "Say: O you disbelievers!'; and 'Say: He is Allah, (the) One." And after he had said the salam, he would say: Subhanal-Malikil-Quddus (Glory be to the Sovereign, the Most Holy) raising his voice the third time

chapter.ara-name: باب التَّسْبِيحِ بَعْدَ الْفَرَاغِ مِنَ الْوِتْرِ وَذِكْرِ الاِخْتِلاَفِ عَلَى سُفْيَانَ فِيهِ
chapter.eng-name: The Tasbih after finishing witr and the variance reported from Sufyan about that
